body:
Hi Everyone,


Greg has written new utility for Radiance - rcollate.  This utility enables
users to easily resize and transpose matrix data (text or binary).  The
program was developed to ease the five-phase method workflow for
illuminance sensor points.  It replaces awk and tr, which were only
available for unix type systems.  Now you can perform the entire five-phase
method workflow on Windows.


Here's the manpage:
https://www.radiance-online.org/learning/documentation/manual-pages/pdfs/rcollate.pdf


The five-phase tutorial has been updated to use the new utility and to
address a couple issues raised by Leyla (thanks!):
https://www.radiance-online.org/learning/tutorials/fivephasetutorialfiles/Tutorial-FivePhaseMethod_v2.pdf


Many thanks to Greg!


Best,
Andy
